nr_band.description: NR band number. Default depends on ORS model, please refer to the connection parameters

dl_nr_arfcn.title: DL NR ARFCN (Alternative to DL Frequency)
dl_nr_arfcn.description: Can be used instead of DL Frequency to directly set the Downlink NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell.

gnb_id.description: eNB ID. Equal to (ORS serial number + 524288) modulo 1048576 by default

pci.description: Physical Cell ID. Range 0 to 1007. Equal to ORS Serial number modulo 1008 by default

root_sequence_index.description: Range: 0 to 137. Equal to ORS serial number modulo 138 by default. Sets prach-RootSequenceIndex parameter. It must be different for each neighbour cell operating on the same frequency and sharing the same PRACH configuration.

plmn_list.description: List of PLMNs broadcasted by the gNodeB, at most 12 (default: 00101)

a3_rsrp.title: Handover A3 event RSRP offset
a3_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP gain offset between eNBs and gNBs which will trigger handover

a4_rsrp.title: Handover A4 event RSRP threshold
a4_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold value in dBm

a5_threshold1_rsrp.title: Handover A5 event RSRP threshold1
a5_threshold1_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold1 value in dBm

a5_threshold2_rsrp.title: Handover A5 event RSRP threshold2
a5_threshold2_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold2 value in dBm

hysteresis.title: NR Handover hysteresis
hysteresis.description: Integer, range from 0 to 30. A3/A4/A5 hysteresis in 0.5dB steps used for the measurement report triggering condition.

time_to_trigger.title: NR Handover time to trigger
time_to_trigger.description: Time in ms during which the A3/A4/A5 event condition must be met before triggering the measurement report.

b1_rsrp.title: Handover B1 event RSRP threshold
b1_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -156 to -30. RSRP threshold value in dBm.

b2_threshold1_rsrp.title: Handover B2 event RSRP threshold1
b2_threshold1_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold1 value in dBm

b2_threshold2_rsrp.title: Handover B2 event RSRP threshold2
b2_threshold2_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold2 value in dBm

hysteresis.title: EUTRA Handover hysteresis
hysteresis.description: Integer, range from 0 to 30. EUTRA B1 or B2 hysteresis in 0.5dB steps.

time_to_trigger.title: EUTRA Handover time to trigger
time_to_trigger.description: Time in ms during which the EUTRA B1 or B2 event condition must be met before triggering the measurement report.
